filename.description: The filename as set when uploaded

url.description: File download url. Unique and valid for 15 minutes, public accessible.

related_object_type.description: Object type of the attachment parent. Is the camelcased base class name: Document for invoice, credit_note,.., Contact for client

related_object_id.description: uuid of the attachment parent object.

content_type.description: Auto detected on upload. Might not always reflect the real content type

size.description: Filesize in kb. Auto detected on upload.

is_signed.description: True if the file(pdf) has been digitally signed.

created_at.description: Date the object was created in SK. Never changes afterwards

team_id.description: A team uuid. If set only the team and its parent teams can see the record.

page.title: Page
page.description: In paginated results set the page to look for

per_page.title: Per page
per_page.description: Results per page. Default is 10, max is 100

filter[from].title: From date
filter[from].description: All objects created at and after the date

filter[to].title: To date
filter[to].description: All objects created at and before the date

sort_by.title: Sort by
sort_by.description: Sort the results by the given field

sort.title: Sort
sort.description: Sort the results in ASC or DESC
